PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of "Aida" - Leading figures in repeat performance of "Aida," in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success..the ballet dancers"
TitMainTitle: Female ballet dancers in Egyptian costumes, including Josephine Dillard second row on right, Harriet Cousar standing on right, and Gloria Cousar second from right in back row, gathered in stairwell in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
